**CRITICAL**: When providing click/hover coordinates:
1. Screenshot dimensions != Browser viewport dimensions
2. Measure x,y on the screenshot image you see below
3. Use format: <coordinate>x,y@WIDTHxHEIGHT</coordinate> where WIDTHxHEIGHT is the EXACT pixel size of the screenshot image
4. Never use the browser viewport size for WIDTHxHEIGHT - it is only for reference and is often larger than the screenshot
5. Screenshots are often downscaled - always use the dimensions you see in the image

我已运行 `npm run build`，之前的 `Unexpected "export"` 错误已消失，构建已成功进入静态路由生成和图像优化阶段。

然而，构建在 `generating optimized images` 阶段失败，出现以下新错误：
`Error: Failed to load remote image https://supabase.amastuces.com/storage/v1/object/public/n8n-workflows/placeholder-workflow.webp. The request did not return a 200 OK response. (received 400)`

### 诊断分析

经过调查，我发现以下情况：
1. **根本原因**：远程占位图 URL 无效。通过浏览器访问该 URL 返回 `{"statusCode":"404","error":"Bucket not found","message":"Bucket not found"}`。这说明 Supabase 上的存储桶 `n8n-workflows` 不存在或无法访问。
2. **构建影响**：Astro 的图像优化功能在构建时会尝试下载并处理所有远程图像。如果远程图像返回非 200 响应，构建过程会直接报错终止。
3. **受影响文件**：该 URL 在 [`src/data/mock-workflows.ts`](src/data/mock-workflows.ts) 中被广泛用作模拟数据的缩略图。

### 建议修复方案
将 [`src/data/mock-workflows.ts`](src/data/mock-workflows.ts) 中的无效远程 URL 替换为本地占位图路径 `/images/placeholder-workflow.svg`（该文件已存在于项目中）。

**请确认是否允许我执行此修复以继续验证构建？**

241 | /**
242 |  * 生成更多模拟工作流数据（用于分页测试）
243 |  */
244 | export function generateMockWorkflows(count: number, startId = 12387): Workflow[] {
245 |   const workflows: Workflow[] = [];
246 |   const titles = [
247 |     'API Integration Workflow',
248 |     'Database Sync Automation',
249 |     'Report Generation System',
250 |     'Webhook Handler',
251 |     'File Processing Pipeline',
252 |     'Notification Router',
253 |     'Data Transformation Flow',
254 |     'Scheduled Task Manager',
255 |     'Error Monitoring System',
256 |     'User Registration Flow',
257 |   ];
258 | 
259 |   for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
260 |     const id = startId - i;
261 |     const titleIndex = i % titles.length;
262 |     const authorIndex = i % mockAuthors.length;
263 |     const date = new Date(2025, 11, 20 - i);
264 | 
265 |     workflows.push({
266 |       id,
267 |       slug: `${titles[titleIndex].toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-${id}`,
268 |       title: `${titles[titleIndex]} #${id}`,
269 |       description: `Automated workflow for ${titles[titleIndex].toLowerCase()}`,
270 |       thumbnail: 'https://supabase.amastuces.com/storage/v1/object/public/n8n-workflows/placeholder-workflow.webp',
271 |       author: mockAuthors[authorIndex],
272 |       categories: ['Productivity'],
273 |       complexityLevel: ['beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced'][i % 3] as any,
274 |       price: i % 3 === 0 ? 0 : Math.floor(Math.random() * 50) + 10,
275 |       visitors: Math.floor(Math.random() * 500) + 50,
276 |       downloads: Math.floor(Math.random() * 150) + 10,
277 |       createdAt: date.toISOString(),
278 |       updatedAt: date.toISOString(),
279 |       publishedAt: date.toISOString(),
280 |       date: formatShortDate(date.toISOString()),
281 |       nodes: Math.floor(Math.random() * 15) + 5,
282 |       version: '1.0.0',
283 |     });
284 |   }
285 | 
286 |   return workflows;
287 | }
288 | 
289 | /**
290 |  * 获取所有模拟工作流（包括生成的）
291 |  */
292 | export function getAllMockWorkflows(total = 100): Workflow[] {
293 |   const additional = generateMockWorkflows(total - mockWorkflows.length);
294 |   return [...mockWorkflows, ...additional];
295 | }
296 | 
297 | /**
298 |  * 根据 slug 获取工作流
299 |  */
300 | export function getMockWorkflowBySlug(slug: string): Workflow | undefined {
301 |   return mockWorkflows.find((workflow) => workflow.slug === slug);
302 | }
303 | 
304 | /**
305 |  * 根据 ID 获取工作流
306 |  */
307 | export function getMockWorkflowById(id: number): Workflow | undefined {
308 |   return mockWorkflows.find((workflow) => workflow.id === id);
309 | }
